content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":251692,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Select"},{"lineNumber":251693,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　マジックと遊んだ後、ランス城に戻る","translatedEnglishLine":"> After playing with Magic, return to Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":251694,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　このまま連続で魔人を倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"> Continue to defeat the demons in succession"},{"lineNumber":251695,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今回は戻る事にする、一晩ここに泊まる","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, I decide to return and stay here for one night."},{"lineNumber":251696,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマジックを誘うが・・なんか断られる？","translatedEnglishLine":"I invite Magic, but... somehow she refuses?"},{"lineNumber":251697,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマジックの性格に合わせてそれっぽいシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"A scene that fits Magic's personality."},{"lineNumber":251698,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t翌日、ランス達はランス城に戻った。","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day, Rance and the others returned to Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":251699,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＜クリア＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Clear>"},{"lineNumber":251700,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t連続して魔人を倒すと決意するランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance resolves to defeat the demons continuously."},{"lineNumber":251701,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tいいねと、ガルティアも喜んでついていく","translatedEnglishLine":"‘Sounds good,’ Galtia happily follows along."},{"lineNumber":251702,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tメディウサは首都ラグナロックアークに居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa is in the capital, Ragnarock Ark."},{"lineNumber":251703,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t多数の魔軍がひしめきあっているが、ガルティア離脱で浮き足だっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Many demon troops are crowded there, but they're unsettled by Galtia’s defection."},{"lineNumber":251704,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今なら突破出来るぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"We can break through now."},{"lineNumber":251705,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t出発する","translatedEnglishLine":"Depart."},{"lineNumber":251706,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t死体ばかりの道・・気味が悪い","translatedEnglishLine":"A path full of corpses... it feels creepy."},{"lineNumber":251707,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tメディウサの仕業だと、ガンジー一行が現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Gandhi and his group appear, saying it’s Medusa’s doing."},{"lineNumber":251708,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの辺りで戦っていたのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"They had been fighting around here."},{"lineNumber":251709,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこのままランス達に合流する","translatedEnglishLine":"They join up with Rance and the others."},{"lineNumber":251710,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t予想より、魔物の抵抗が少ない、どうなってんだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s less monster resistance than expected, what’s going on?"},{"lineNumber":251711,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマジックより魔法電話","translatedEnglishLine":"A magical phone call from Magic."},{"lineNumber":251712,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t全ての部隊でラグナロックアーク周辺の魔軍を攻めている","translatedEnglishLine":"All units are attacking the demon forces around Ragnarock Ark."},{"lineNumber":251713,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tとマジック達により支援","translatedEnglishLine":"Supported by Magic and the others."},{"lineNumber":251714,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tマジックは電話で父が無事な事を知る、ちょっと安心する","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic learns by phone that her father is safe and feels a bit relieved."},{"lineNumber":251715,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t城が見えた、魔軍はほとんどいない","translatedEnglishLine":"The castle is in sight; there are almost no demon troops."},{"lineNumber":251716,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカオス、魔軍兵は逃げたが・・奴は中にいる、俺には分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos says the demon soldiers fled... but that guy is inside. I can tell."},{"lineNumber":251717,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人メディウサだ、中にいるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s the demon Medusa. She’s inside."},{"lineNumber":251718,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tいこう","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go."},{"lineNumber":251719,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t城の中、アレフガルドが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the castle, Alefgard appears."},{"lineNumber":251720,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tガルティアを見て、裏切ったのですか・・と何か文句","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing Galtia, he complains, ‘You betrayed us, huh...’"},{"lineNumber":251721,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tメディウサはこの状況で逃げないのかたいした物だなと誰か","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone remarks on how impressive it is that Medusa doesn't flee in this situation."},{"lineNumber":251722,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t逃げる？そんな必要は無いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Flee? There’s no need for that."},{"lineNumber":251723,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人間といくばくかの裏切り魔人が来た所でメディウサ様にはかなわない","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if humans and a few traitorous demons come, they can’t match Lady Medusa."},{"lineNumber":251724,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそれ以前に私にもです","translatedEnglishLine":"Even before that, not against me either."},{"lineNumber":251725,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tと戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"Combat begins."},{"lineNumber":251726,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tメディウサの部屋に到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at Medusa’s room."},{"lineNumber":251727,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまわりは死体だらけ、血の臭いが充満している","translatedEnglishLine":"The surroundings are full of corpses, the smell of blood fills the air."},{"lineNumber":251728,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアレフガルド・・どうしたの、返事しなさい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alefgard... what’s wrong? Answer me."},{"lineNumber":251729,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t殺されちゃったの、ひどーい。","translatedEnglishLine":"I was killed... how awful."},{"lineNumber":251730,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘になる","translatedEnglishLine":"Combat ensues."},{"lineNumber":251731,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t奇跡的にメディウサを倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"Miraculously defeat Medusa."},{"lineNumber":251732,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tやっほー、ガンジーも大喜び","translatedEnglishLine":"Yahoo! Gandhi is also very happy."},{"lineNumber":251733,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tここにかけつけたマジック、ウルザも喜ぶ","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic and Urza, who rushed here, are also happy."},{"lineNumber":251734,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tラグナロックアークは解放され、魔軍に逃げ出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ragnarock Ark is liberated, and the demon troops have fled."},{"lineNumber":251735,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍司令部のツォトン","translatedEnglishLine":"Tsoton of the demon army command."},{"lineNumber":251736,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ガルティアの裏切り","translatedEnglishLine":"The betrayal of the demon Galtia."},{"lineNumber":251737,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人メディウサが倒された","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Medusa was defeated."},{"lineNumber":251738,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t首都ラグナロックアークが人間に奪い返された","translatedEnglishLine":"The capital, Ragnarock Ark, was reclaimed by humans."},{"lineNumber":251739,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tあまりもひどい報告を受けて激怒","translatedEnglishLine":"He becomes furious upon receiving such terrible reports."},{"lineNumber":251740,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t部下にあたり散らす","translatedEnglishLine":"He vents his anger on his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":251741,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＜クリア＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Clear>"},{"lineNumber":251742,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t短縮ルートに入ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Entering the shortcut route."},{"lineNumber":251743,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t奇跡的にランスがガルティアを倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"Miraculously, Rance defeats Galtia."},{"lineNumber":251744,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tやったー","translatedEnglishLine":"Yay!"},{"lineNumber":251745,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス国、魔人ガルティアはランスに倒されたが、まだメディウサが健在","translatedEnglishLine":"In the country of Zeth, demon Galtia was defeated by Rance, but Medusa is still active."},{"lineNumber":251746,"originalJapaneseLine":"おおざっぱな情報を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Show the rough information."},{"lineNumber":251747,"originalJapaneseLine":"ユーザーは他の地域も見た後、しばらくしてから来る事もあるので","translatedEnglishLine":"Since the user might come after viewing other regions for a while,"},{"lineNumber":251748,"originalJapaneseLine":"忘れていないようにおさらい的に情報を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Show the information as a review so they don’t forget."},{"lineNumber":251749,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はゼス国に入り首都を目指す","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his group enter the country of Zeth and aim for the capital."},{"lineNumber":251750,"originalJapaneseLine":"正午、ランス達は小さな町についていた","translatedEnglishLine":"At noon, Rance and the group arrived at a small town."},{"lineNumber":251751,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス軍も少しおり、ランス達のサポートをしてくれている","translatedEnglishLine":"Some Zeth troops are also here and are supporting Rance and the others."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Select

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　マジックと遊んだ後、ランス城に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > After playing with Magic, return to Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　このまま連続で魔人を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Continue to defeat the demons in succession

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は戻る事にする、一晩ここに泊まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, I decide to return and stay here for one night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックを誘うが・・なんか断られる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I invite Magic, but... somehow she refuses?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの性格に合わせてそれっぽいシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scene that fits Magic's personality.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、ランス達はランス城に戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, Rance and the others returned to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連続して魔人を倒すと決意するランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance resolves to defeat the demons continuously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいねと、ガルティアも喜んでついていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Sounds good,’ Galtia happily follows along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサは首都ラグナロックアークに居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa is in the capital, Ragnarock Ark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多数の魔軍がひしめきあっているが、ガルティア離脱で浮き足だっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many demon troops are crowded there, but they're unsettled by Galtia’s defection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今なら突破出来るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can break through now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出発する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Depart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死体ばかりの道・・気味が悪い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A path full of corpses... it feels creepy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの仕業だと、ガンジー一行が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi and his group appear, saying it’s Medusa’s doing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺りで戦っていたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had been fighting around here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままランス達に合流する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They join up with Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予想より、魔物の抵抗が少ない、どうなってんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s less monster resistance than expected, what’s going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックより魔法電話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A magical phone call from Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての部隊でラグナロックアーク周辺の魔軍を攻めている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All units are attacking the demon forces around Ragnarock Ark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とマジック達により支援
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supported by Magic and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは電話で父が無事な事を知る、ちょっと安心する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic learns by phone that her father is safe and feels a bit relieved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城が見えた、魔軍はほとんどいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The castle is in sight; there are almost no demon troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、魔軍兵は逃げたが・・奴は中にいる、俺には分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says the demon soldiers fled... but that guy is inside. I can tell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メディウサだ、中にいるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s the demon Medusa. She’s inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いこう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の中、アレフガルドが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the castle, Alefgard appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアを見て、裏切ったのですか・・と何か文句
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing Galtia, he complains, ‘You betrayed us, huh...’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサはこの状況で逃げないのかたいした物だなと誰か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone remarks on how impressive it is that Medusa doesn't flee in this situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げる？そんな必要は無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flee? There’s no need for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間といくばくかの裏切り魔人が来た所でメディウサ様にはかなわない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if humans and a few traitorous demons come, they can’t match Lady Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以前に私にもです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even before that, not against me either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Combat begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの部屋に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Medusa’s room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まわりは死体だらけ、血の臭いが充満している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The surroundings are full of corpses, the smell of blood fills the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルド・・どうしたの、返事しなさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alefgard... what’s wrong? Answer me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺されちゃったの、ひどーい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was killed... how awful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Combat ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡的にメディウサを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miraculously defeat Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっほー、ガンジーも大喜び
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yahoo! Gandhi is also very happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにかけつけたマジック、ウルザも喜ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and Urza, who rushed here, are also happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークは解放され、魔軍に逃げ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarock Ark is liberated, and the demon troops have fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部のツォトン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton of the demon army command.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ガルティアの裏切り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The betrayal of the demon Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メディウサが倒された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Medusa was defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都ラグナロックアークが人間に奪い返された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The capital, Ragnarock Ark, was reclaimed by humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりもひどい報告を受けて激怒
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He becomes furious upon receiving such terrible reports.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下にあたり散らす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He vents his anger on his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 短縮ルートに入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entering the shortcut route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡的にランスがガルティアを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miraculously, Rance defeats Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やったー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス国、魔人ガルティアはランスに倒されたが、まだメディウサが健在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the country of Zeth, demon Galtia was defeated by Rance, but Medusa is still active.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おおざっぱな情報を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show the rough information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーザーは他の地域も見た後、しばらくしてから来る事もあるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the user might come after viewing other regions for a while,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忘れていないようにおさらい的に情報を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show the information as a review so they don’t forget.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はゼス国に入り首都を目指す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group enter the country of Zeth and aim for the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正午、ランス達は小さな町についていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At noon, Rance and the group arrived at a small town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍も少しおり、ランス達のサポートをしてくれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some Zeth troops are also here and are supporting Rance and the others.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Select

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　マジックと遊んだ後、ランス城に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > After playing with Magic, return to Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　このまま連続で魔人を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Continue to defeat the demons in succession

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は戻る事にする、一晩ここに泊まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, I decide to return and stay here for one night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックを誘うが・・なんか断られる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I invite Magic, but... somehow she refuses?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの性格に合わせてそれっぽいシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scene that fits Magic's personality.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、ランス達はランス城に戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, Rance and the others returned to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連続して魔人を倒すと決意するランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance resolves to defeat the demons continuously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいねと、ガルティアも喜んでついていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Sounds good,’ Galtia happily follows along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサは首都ラグナロックアークに居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa is in the capital, Ragnarock Ark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多数の魔軍がひしめきあっているが、ガルティア離脱で浮き足だっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many demon troops are crowded there, but they're unsettled by Galtia’s defection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今なら突破出来るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can break through now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出発する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Depart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死体ばかりの道・・気味が悪い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A path full of corpses... it feels creepy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの仕業だと、ガンジー一行が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi and his group appear, saying it’s Medusa’s doing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺りで戦っていたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had been fighting around here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままランス達に合流する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They join up with Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予想より、魔物の抵抗が少ない、どうなってんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s less monster resistance than expected, what’s going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックより魔法電話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A magical phone call from Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての部隊でラグナロックアーク周辺の魔軍を攻めている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All units are attacking the demon forces around Ragnarock Ark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とマジック達により支援
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supported by Magic and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは電話で父が無事な事を知る、ちょっと安心する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic learns by phone that her father is safe and feels a bit relieved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城が見えた、魔軍はほとんどいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The castle is in sight; there are almost no demon troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、魔軍兵は逃げたが・・奴は中にいる、俺には分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says the demon soldiers fled... but that guy is inside. I can tell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メディウサだ、中にいるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s the demon Medusa. She’s inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いこう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の中、アレフガルドが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the castle, Alefgard appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアを見て、裏切ったのですか・・と何か文句
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing Galtia, he complains, ‘You betrayed us, huh...’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサはこの状況で逃げないのかたいした物だなと誰か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone remarks on how impressive it is that Medusa doesn't flee in this situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げる？そんな必要は無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flee? There’s no need for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間といくばくかの裏切り魔人が来た所でメディウサ様にはかなわない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if humans and a few traitorous demons come, they can’t match Lady Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以前に私にもです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even before that, not against me either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Combat begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの部屋に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Medusa’s room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まわりは死体だらけ、血の臭いが充満している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The surroundings are full of corpses, the smell of blood fills the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルド・・どうしたの、返事しなさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alefgard... what’s wrong? Answer me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺されちゃったの、ひどーい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was killed... how awful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Combat ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡的にメディウサを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miraculously defeat Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっほー、ガンジーも大喜び
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yahoo! Gandhi is also very happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにかけつけたマジック、ウルザも喜ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and Urza, who rushed here, are also happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークは解放され、魔軍に逃げ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarock Ark is liberated, and the demon troops have fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部のツォトン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton of the demon army command.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ガルティアの裏切り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The betrayal of the demon Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メディウサが倒された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Medusa was defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都ラグナロックアークが人間に奪い返された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The capital, Ragnarock Ark, was reclaimed by humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりもひどい報告を受けて激怒
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He becomes furious upon receiving such terrible reports.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下にあたり散らす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He vents his anger on his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 短縮ルートに入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entering the shortcut route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡的にランスがガルティアを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miraculously, Rance defeats Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やったー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス国、魔人ガルティアはランスに倒されたが、まだメディウサが健在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the country of Zeth, demon Galtia was defeated by Rance, but Medusa is still active.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おおざっぱな情報を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show the rough information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーザーは他の地域も見た後、しばらくしてから来る事もあるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the user might come after viewing other regions for a while,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忘れていないようにおさらい的に情報を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show the information as a review so they don’t forget.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はゼス国に入り首都を目指す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group enter the country of Zeth and aim for the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正午、ランス達は小さな町についていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At noon, Rance and the group arrived at a small town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍も少しおり、ランス達のサポートをしてくれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some Zeth troops are also here and are supporting Rance and the others.
